plot: Narya is thrown out of his village for being unlucky. Later, the villagers try to trace him as he could bring luck to his village.
title: Shubha Bol Narya
plot_es: Narya is thrown out of his village for being unlucky. Later, the villagers try to trace him as he could bring luck to his village.
plot_en: Narya is thrown out of his village for being unlucky. Later, the villagers try to trace him as he could bring luck to his village.
